description: Ireland's acting chief medical officer says there has been virus outbreaks in a range of work settings.
title: Coronavirus: Concerns over workplace outbreaks in Republic
title_page: Coronavirus: Concerns over workplace outbreaks in Republic - BBC News
maintext: Dr Glynn said it was the first significant cluster on a construction site and there was a full outbreak control team in place, but he wanted to use it to remind employers of their need to ramp up their efforts to put the safety of staff and customers first.
